  • Method Details

    • setupNativeAppExecution

      public static org.openqa.selenium.MutableCapabilities setupNativeAppExecution(String username, String password, String deviceName, String osVersion, String relativePathToAppFile, String appName)
      Use this method to set up all the needed capabilities to be able to upload and test the latest version of your native application. You can refer to the getting started guide for BrowserStack App Automate to get all the needed information here https://app-automate.browserstack.com/dashboard/v2/getting-started
      Parameters:
      username - Your BrowserStack username
      password - Your BrowserStack password
      deviceName - Name of the Target device
      osVersion - Version of the Target operating system
      relativePathToAppFile - Relative path to your app file inside the project directory
      appName - Name of your APK (excluding version number). This will be used as your CustomID so that you can keep uploading new versions of the same app and run your tests against them.
      Returns:
      appURL for the newly uploaded app file on BrowserStack to be used for future tests

    • setupNativeAppExecution

      public static org.openqa.selenium.MutableCapabilities setupNativeAppExecution(String username, String password, String deviceName, String osVersion, String appUrl)
      Use this method to set up all the needed capabilities to be able to test an already uploaded version of your native application. You can refer to the getting started guide for BrowserStack App Automate to get all the needed information here https://app-automate.browserstack.com/dashboard/v2/getting-started
      Parameters:
      username - Your BrowserStack username
      password - Your BrowserStack password
      deviceName - Name of the Target device
      osVersion - Version of the Target operating system
      appUrl - Url of the target app that was previously uploaded to be tested via BrowserStack

    • setupDesktopWebExecution

      public static org.openqa.selenium.MutableCapabilities setupDesktopWebExecution()
